resources.string: Your 16 digit card / account number is located on your |!b|W|!?|Rewards, MySchool, Store or Credit Cards.
BY LOGGING IN YOU AGREE TO OUR \n|!s|TERMS AND CONDITIONS|!?|
|!b|GET THE CREDIT CARD THAT REWARDS YOU EACH AND EVERY TIME YOU SWIPE.|!?|

With a Woolworths Credit Card you will earn |!b|W|!?|Vouchers each and every time you shop with your card. As a Woolworths Credit card holder, you\'re automatically part of our great |!b|W|!?|Rewards programme that gives you the opportunity to save from 10% instantly on thousands of items throughout the store.
HOW MUCH DO YOU WANT TO WITHDRAW?
YOUR ADDITIONAL MONTHLY REPAYMENT WILL BE
|!b|THERE ARE TIMES WHEN ALL OF US COULD USE SOME EXTRA CASH TO COVER INFORESEEN EXPENSES.|!?|
Flexible repayment terms of up to 60 months
Re-use all the money that has been re-paid
Low initiation and monthly service fees
Convenience of accessing cash through our interactive voice message system or mobile app.
We apologise, the system is unavailable. Please try again later.
In order to proceed, please enter a valid South African ID Number in the relevant field.
In order to proceed, please enter a valid Account/Card Number in the relevant field.

|!b|W|!?|REWARDS is a tiered programme, the tier you\'re on depends on how much you spend. The more you spend, the more rewards you\'ll enjoy. All your purchases at woolworths and at www.woolworths.co.za count - just remember to swipe your card upfront with every purchase and include your cards number on your online orders

I would like to apply for a Woolworths Store Card! Please contact me on:

To apply, visit a Woolies store.
Thank you for using our self service withdrawal facility. The money will be transferred to your account within 48 hours.
THE MOST REWARDING WAY TO SHOP
YEAR TO DATE WREWARDS INSTANT SAVINGS
YEAR TO DATE WREWARDS GREEN EARNED
QUARTERLY VOUCHER – YEAR TO DATE VALUE EARNED
YOUR TIER STATUS FOR THE MONTH
Instant |!b|W|!?|Rewards savings on more than 1000 items, plus an additional 5% off when paying with your Woolies Credit or Store Card
Exclusive |!b|W|!?|Rewards savings vouchers throughout the year

The |!s|W|!?|Rewards year is calculated from the first Monday of each financial year of Woolworths which commences at the end of June or at the beginning of July and comes to an end on the last Sunday of the Woolworths financial year 12 (twelve) months later.
Your spend updates are refreshed on the 12th day after each specified month end date.
Your |!b|W|!?|Rewards tier status is updated at the end of each month.
SPEND BETWEEN %1$s AND %2$s PER YEAR AT WOOLWORTHS
SPEND OVER %1$s PER YEAR AT WOOLWORTHS

Message for user who does not have location services switched on. It will prompt them to go to settings and turn it on. Still to be designed. Alternatively, you can search by Store or Location in the top right corner.
Woolworths Black Credit cardholders you’ll receive a monthly voucher for a free TASTE magazine
You’ll receive a free coffee or tea at any Woolworths Café, To Go or Tapas Bar twice a month.
Woolworths VIP Black Credit cardholders get free online delivery. Simply link your Black Credit Card to your online profile.
Your Woolworths Credit Card is internationally recognised and accepted at 29 million outlets around the world wherever you see the Visa sign.
\u2022Be 18 or older \n\u2022Have a valid RSA ID number \n\u2022Earn over R41 666 per month
When collecting your credit card, bring the following:

\u2022Avalid South African ID \n\u2022Your latest three payslips or your last three months’ bank statements \n\u2022Proof of residence in the form of a recent utility bill or your original bank statements dated within the last three months

•Flexible repayment terms of up to 60 months 
•Re-use the money that’s been paid back towards your loan 
•Low initiation and monthly service fees 
•Easily apply to increase your limit if needed 
•Settle your account early without penalties 
•Make additional payments towards your loan 
•Easily access your cash using our mobi app or our interactive voice message system
Once your application has been approved the cash will be in your account within 48 hours.
Simply contact our Call Centre on 0861 50 20 20 to apply for additional funds.

Interest will be charged according to the National Credit Act (NCA) and will never exceed the maximum allowed by the NCA. The interest rate charged is a variable interest rate that is linked to the Repo Rate, which may change from time to time.

•Be 18 or older 
•Have a valid South African ID 
•Earn a minimum of R2 000 per month 
•Provide your latest three payslips or your last three months’ bank statements Have your own bank account
